DOC.brief_title: Programs Support You During Chemotherapy ( Pro-You )
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To obtain preliminary data efficacy Yoga Skills Training ( YST ) improve target outcome ( primary : fatigue ; secondary : depressive symptom ) compare attention control ( AC ) . II . To explore potential mediator ( psychological stress , circadian disruption , inflammation ) moderator ( gender , dose YST , outcome expectancy ) effect YST target outcome . III . To qualitatively assess perceived efficacy intervention acceptance daily measurement semi-structured interview subset participant . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 arm . ARM I ( YST intervention ) : Patients undergo YST intervention comprise four individualized , 30 minute in-person session instructs skill enhance mindfulness promote relaxation outpatient chemotherapy session week 2 , 4 , 6 , 8 . Patients practice awareness - notice current state establish relax breathe 5 minute ; movement - 7 minute gentle movement coordinate breath ( raise lower arm ) ; breathe practice - 3 minute inhale cool air straw ; meditation - 5 minute focus let go physical mental tension . Patients give handout describe YST audio recording device play record encourage patient practice daily . Strategies increase adherence home practice implement patient ask keep home practice log . ARM II ( attention control ) : Patients attend four 30-minute in-person session interventionist week 2 , 4 , 6 , 8 . During session , patient encourage discuss experience receive chemotherapy receive instruction movement , meditation breathing practice . Patients also ask write brief diary entry daily home . After completion study , patient follow 4 week .
